page.title: 15CARDROSS _ HEALTH
page.content: {DOCTORS -}THERE ARE NO G.P FACILITIES IN THE VILLAGE. PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL AT LEAST FOUR MILES TO ATTEND HEALTH CENTRES IN HELENSBURGH, DUMBARTON, OR ALEXANDRIA. {CHEMISTS -}BECAUSE THERE IS NO DOCTOR PRACTISING IN THE VILLAGE, THERE IS NO CHEMIST AND AGAIN, PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL TO HAVE A PRESCRIPTION MADE UP, THEREBY INCREASING THE COST OF LIVING. {HOSPITALS -}THE VALE OF LEVEN DISTRICT GENERAL HOSPITAL IN ALEXANDRIA PROVIDES CASUALTY, MATERNITY AND GERIATRIC FACILITIES. MATERNITY AND CHILD CLINICS ARE ALSO HELD IN HEALTH CENTRES. {DISTRICT NURSES -}THE VILLAGE IS SERVED BY DISTRICT NURSES ATTACHED TO HEALTH CENTRES.
